:offsetBottom.description: Triggers when the specified offset is reached from the bottom of the window
:offsetBottom.description_zh: 距离窗口底部达到指定偏移量后触发

:offsetTop.description: Triggers when the specified offset is reached from the top of the window
:offsetTop.description_zh: 距离窗口顶部达到指定偏移量后触发

:target.description: Set the element for which Affix needs to listen for scrolling events, with a value of a function that returns the corresponding DOM element
:target.description_zh: 设置 Affix 需要监听其滚动事件的元素，值为一个返回对应 DOM 元素的函数

events.name: onChange
events.description: Fixed callback function that is triggered when the state changes
events.description_zh: 固定状态改变时触发的回调函数
